arStrings.szText: While you have both bonuses from the {c_important}Close Quarters Combat{/c} Key Passive active, your Dodge Chance increases by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c} whenever you're hit by an enemy. Successfully Dodging resets this bonus.
When struck with both bonuses from the {c_important}Close Quarters Combat{/c} Key Passive, gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%+|]{/c} Dodge Chance.
